mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rent (rent_seq, user_seq, user_id, ins_num, car_num, rent_start_date, rent_end_date, rent_pickup_place, rent_paid_amount, rent_payment_option, rent_is_canceled) VALUES ( rent_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userSeq}, #{userId}, #{insuranceNumber}, #{carNumber}, TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{pickupPlace}, #{paidAmount}, #{paymentOption}, #{isCanceled} )
mapper.select: SELECT rent_seq, user_seq, user_id, ins_num, car_num, rent_start_date, rent_end_date, rent_pickup_place, rent_paid_amount, rent_payment_option, rent_is_canceled FROM rent WHERE rent_seq = #{value}
SELECT rent_seq, user_seq, user_id, ins_num, car_num, rent_start_date, rent_end_date, rent_pickup_place, rent_paid_amount, rent_payment_option, rent_is_canceled FROM rent WHERE user_id = #{value}

SELECT rent_seq, user_seq, user_id, ins_num, car_num, rent_start_date, rent_end_date, rent_pickup_place, rent_paid_amount, rent_payment_option, rent_is_canceled FROM rent WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND rent_is_canceled = #{isCanceled}

SELECT rent_seq, user_seq, user_id, ins_num, car_num, rent_start_date, rent_end_date, rent_pickup_place, rent_paid_amount, rent_payment_option, rent_is_canceled FROM rent WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND RENT_END_DATE < SYSDATE AND rent_is_canceled = 0

SELECT rent_seq, user_seq, user_id, ins_num, car_num, rent_start_date, rent_end_date, rent_pickup_place, rent_paid_amount, rent_payment_option, rent_is_canceled FROM rent WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND RENT_END_DATE >= SYSDATE AND rent_is_canceled = 0
